amendment.description: Manager's amendments consist of the text of the amendment contained in House Report 110-151 and printed on pages H5244-H5246 in the Congressional Record for May 16, 2007.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments nos 5, 9, 10, 17, 18, 26, 27, 36, 37, 47, 48, and 50 printed in House Report 110-151.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
